member.name: T:Microsoft.PowerShell.Diagnostics.Activities.ExportCounter
member.summary: Activity to invoke the Microsoft.PowerShell.Diagnostics\Export-Counter command in a Workflow.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PowerShell.Diagnostics.Activities.ExportCounter.#ctor
member.summary: Gets the display name of the command invoked by this activity.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PowerShell.Diagnostics.Activities.ExportCounter.GetPowerShell(System.Activities.NativeActivityContext)
member.summary: Returns a configured instance of System.Management.Automation.PowerShell, pre-populated with the command to run.
member.param: The NativeActivityContext for the currently running activity.
member.remarks: The infrastructure takes responsibility for closing and disposing the PowerShell instance returned.

member.summary: Gets the fully qualified name of the command invoked by this activity.
